lead_paragraph: A federal indictment charges two Glaxo research scientists and three others with the theft of data they planned to sell through a company in China.
snippet: A federal indictment charges two Glaxo research scientists and three others with the theft of data they planned to sell through a company in China.

headline.main: 5 Accused of Stealing Drug Secrets From GlaxoSmithKline
headline.print_headline: 5 Accused of Stealing Drug Secrets From GlaxoSmithKline

abstract: Federal prosecutors in Philadelphia say they have indicted five people, including two research scientists, on charges of pilfering trade secrets about drugs to treat cancer and other diseases from GlaxoSmithKline.
